attributes.action: Undertake a review of how Local Highway authorities  apply speed limits in a haphazard and inconsistent manner
attributes.additional_details:
Near where I live  there is a stretch of road  about half a mile long which has three different speed limits on that stretch of road.

It  goes from 30 mph   to National speed limit   and then changes to 40 mph limit.

I estimate that the stretch of road with the national speed limit  is less than 400 yards.    Surely  it  would be better  to extend  the 40 mph limit    to where it meets the   30 mph zone.
